thobe.widgets.decoratorPanel

Class Decorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • thobe.widgets.decoratorPanel.Decorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisableDecorator

    public abstract class Decorator
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A class that can be used to decorate an panel. The Decorator can only be used in connection with the DecoratorPanel.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Decorator

        public Decorator(int layer)
        Ctor
        Parameters:
        layer - - The layer (zOrder) at witch the Decorator should be placed. The higher the layer the higher is the Decorator in the stack of Panels. Assuming that the component to be decorated is in layer 0 (like in DecoratorPanel) a Decorator with layer 1 will be above that component and will overlay it.
